publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4348.2 John Scott: National Waste Strategyâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-4348) in the name of Roseanna Cunningham, insert at end ", and notes that, in order to meet medium and long-term targets, the issue of developing further waste infrastructure must be tackled as a priority to better address the management, reduction, recycling and disposal of commercial and industrial waste in Scotland."
